title: MDOT SHA - SWPPP Dashboard
description:
The MDOT SHA SWPPP is a comprehensive inventory of assets within SHA maintenance shops. These assets are inventoried as part of the Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan required by the Maryland Department of Environment (MDE). The SWPPP application is used in conjunction with other elements of the SWPPP by the Environmental Compliance Division (ECD), part of the Maryland State Highway Administration Office of Environmental Design (OED).

Last Updated on 06/07/2018
snippet: The SWPPP map services represent an inventory of all MDOT SHA maintenance shop assets that are required to be inventoried under SWPPP.
accessInformation: MDOT State Highway Administration, Office of Environmental Design, Office of Planning and Preliminary Engineering Data Governance Division, KCI Technologies, Kerry McMahon, kmcmahon@sha.state.md.us, Elliott Plack, eplack@sha.state.md.us
